Text: Why mpg format? It's so outdated. I wish they were in mp4 or wmv format. Btw what's the video resolution of these files?

@arian25 It's not an outdated format - I've got the MPEG's because just about EVERY PC in the world can play that format with ease.

Also, the Video Bitrate is one each one is nearly 2,000 Kbps - The Quality is Excellent.
